name: Olymporian 4x
description:
It's BUGGY & INCOMPLETE.

I am working on an update, but that will be sometime in Q2 of 2018.

The windows build is out of date. And will not be updated until many more of the game's features have been added.

Objectives:

Transport your troops to all planets and conquer the galaxy. (Troop to troop battle only in this version). Ships will be coming soon.

Keep your planets alive by keeping waste under 100. If you fail to do so, the planet will be lost forever.

You lose, if you have no planets in the galaxy.

Instructions:

Once you start a new game, you will need to find your planet. You are always Green. To navigate the galaxy, you will need to click in the void of space and move your mouse cursor in the direction you wish to see.

You can select a planet by clicking on it.

Transport troops by clicking on the TRANS button of the planet you wish to send your troops from, then select the Destination. Don't forget to adjust the amount of troops to send.

HINT: when setting any value which has a percent bar to the left of buttons, try clicking somewhere in the bar to more quickly adjust the value.

Known Bugs:

  • Possible bug: The game could crash if any one of your enemies are defeated.
